name: Ballito Microlight Academy (Pty) Ltd
about: Ballito Microlight Academy (Pty) Ltd is a private aviation club located just inland of the town of Ballito on the South African North Coast. Our members fly a variety of aircraft, including microlights (Aquillas) and light aircraft (Slings, Foxbats, RVâ€™s, Cubs, and similar). Situated within King Shaka airspace, we operate under a unique agreement requiring transponder equipment and adherence to specific corridors for safe routing. The club features four grass runways and a welcoming clubhouse with excellent facilities for both visiting pilots and members. We emphasize safety and compliance, with daily operations requiring communication with King Shaka Air Traffic Control and adherence to Durban Special Rules frequency. Our friendly atmosphere and scenic flights make us an ideal choice for aviation enthusiasts. Join us for an unforgettable flying experience.
